website_summaries.verdict: All things considered, the Propet Stability X came highly recommended because of how comfortable it was for daily use. The footgear was also deemed lightweight and stylish.
pros: Almost all of the reviewers stated that the Propet Stability X was very comfortable during long periods of standing and walking
Many buyers liked that the trainer was snug at the heel but had a roomy forefoot which allowed their toes to splay
The arch support was commended by numerous owners
The style of the shoe delighted a significant number of people
Multiple purchasers enjoyed the lightweight nature of the footwear
Several individuals were pleased that this model allowed the use of custom orthotics
This product was deemed stable by some folks
A few shoppers noted that the merchandise worked well in keeping their foot cool during hot weather
A handful of persons said it was reasonably priced given its quality build
cons: A minority of wearers complained that the tongue was too short to properly cover the instep
The collar did not provide a snug fit even when the laces were tied tightly, according to several testers
Some critics did not find the style of the footgear to be appealing
A few people disliked the upper material because it was too rigid
The outsole was too slippery, griped a couple of commenters

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, Odd color pricing
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are lightweight and comfortable. I especially like the having the ability to remove either one or both the inner soles or also replace with your own inner sole. These options definitely help with adjusting fit and comfort. The price was pretty good at $45 and I was thinking of possibly purchasing another pair but when I looked at other colors, black or blue, they were $75 dollars, $30 more for the same shoe. What's up with that I don't know. If they were the same price I would have already ordered but not at &75.
customer_reviews.author: Techguy1724

customer_reviews.title: Runs VERY LARGE
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers run about a full size too long -- width is okay. Cheap construction and materials for the price they are charging. They are very light weight, though, so if you require a shoe without much weight at all, these may do the trick. I would not buy these shoes again, and I would NOT recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Roget

customer_reviews.title: Nice roomy toebox classy look
customer_reviews.text: I need the extra room int he toe box. Very comfortable, I think they look like dress shoes but I use them to work out as well. insert is removable so it fits my ortho insert. Overall these are great comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: WGC

customer_reviews.title: Width is an issue
customer_reviews.text: Shoe seems to be build well and look very nice, I ordered a 10.5 B(N) width, Received the shoes and they were not even close to a Narrow width. I would estimate the with was somewhere between a D and C, Checked the shoe to make sure I was sent the correct one. It said 10.5 B(N) on the inside of the tongue. Oh well they are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Vic A

customer_reviews.title: Not for diabetics.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9w these run very narrow and about a half size small. Also someone said they were okay for diabetics, they are not they have seams inside.
customer_reviews.author: M. Q. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Needs To Be More Proactive
customer_reviews.text: As many have said previously, shoes made in Asia run smaller than what the labels indicate. Honestly, I am surprised that as big of a company as is Amazon, why they don't send the manufacturers some examples of US size feet. I gave it 4 stars for now, but as I only wear these shoes on a limited basis I will be concerned about quality construction and materials...or the lack thereof. So if I experience problems in those areas I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Classy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a line of shoes with really extended widths. Besides, they are beautifully designed, comfortable and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo R. Igonda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Great Value Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes during an Amazon sale. They are light, comfortable and seem very durable. I find that they fit true to size. I wear them every day and have put a fair number of miles on them walking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Muc
customer_reviews.text: According to Propet's website, these are supposed to be extra extra deep shoes that accommodate custom orthotics. Even without any inserts in them, they arent as deep as my Sketchers. I ordered wide and I would say they are more medium and a half. Length is a half a size off. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Orion Repka

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these! For supper with a lot of food issues – including flat sheet. These fit my orthotics perfectly. Extremely comfortable, very stable sole. Will be buying more. Very light weight as well
customer_reviews.author: Knewsman

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Husband is a difficult fit! This shoe works for his wide feet!
customer_reviews.author: GaGa G

customer_reviews.title: Don't wear on wet ground
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really comfortable but water seeps in between the sole and toe so I can't wear them at all when it is raining or even when the ground is wet.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Judis

customer_reviews.title: The Shoe that Fits
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with the fit of these shoes. It's difficult to find my size but these are shoes I would recommend to anyone, especially if you're looking for a good-looking shoe that's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Sizes vary dramatically!!
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I bought in grey fit like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Steveyg

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: My husband said they fit great It's hard for him to find shoes because of his diabetes
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: About the prophet  ahoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are so comfortable on my feet even with my foot swallowing ok thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Boerner

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who has wide feet. I would say they were more of a wide width instead of an extra wide.
customer_reviews.author: Some Are

customer_reviews.title: no good for tall foot
customer_reviews.text: tight on the top of the foot need more room on the top upper
customer_reviews.author: Adolf

customer_reviews.title: Too Small - couldn't even get them on.
customer_reviews.text: I liked them from an appearance standpoint, and this is the first wide sneaker I ever bought. I couldn't even get them on my left foot (which is a bit larger than my right) with a pair of socks on. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: AdirondackKid

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfying On The Feet! 😌
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and very form-fitting from heal to toe! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Brian Allen

product_meta.title: Propét Men's Stability X Sneaker
product_meta.description: This shoe has a mesh upper with brushed-nylon lining and padded collar and tongue. The pu insole has a gel heel pad and cushioning ridges for maximum comfort. The eva midsole is arch-supporting, and the outsole is rubber for durable wear and traction.
feature_bullets: Double insoles - with the Propet EV (Extra Volume) insole system, customized fit and comfort is easy
Features a footbed that can be removed to accommodate custom orthotics
